content:
I had to bit the bullet, also.  I added it last week.  The bandwidth cost of my site is getting very high.  I'm hoping this can offset the expense.

So far, the ads have been incredibly well-placed.  Since most of my traffic comes from Google posts anyway, I thought it would make sense to add the ads.

Good luck.
I've been pulling about $1-$2 a day since adding it to my blog. You'll probably pull more since your readership is higher. Monday I got my first check... $117!!
